external_games.name: Hamster Playground - Spooky Hamster House DLC

name: Hamster Playground: Spooky Hamster House
summary: Spooky Hamster House DLC is the first expansion pack for Hamster Playground. Redecorate Hamster House in a spooky way and dress your Hamsters up in new costumes that would not be out of place at a zombie prom! Complete fresh quests and experience a new, deliciously witchy hamster job.
